name: Fantasticulture
description:
This game was made for the 2021 Cultural Heritage Game Jam.

You play as a culture on brink of extinction, as they are threatened by the forces of climate change come alive. It is your duty to build towers to help fight these monsters, so that your culture may live on.

Now, the game is not complete as there were some features that we had put on the backlog for time's sake. Those features included another class of enemy to represent looters of cultural sites, towers that would handle those enemy types peacefully, and other features to make play more interesting.

Created by 

Programmers: Ben Schuster, John Mordi, Liam Barrett, George Tang

Artists: Scott Furman, Katrina Ely, Ty Matthews

Designers: Julian Salgado, Devun Schneider

Fonts Used:

Fredoka by Milena Brandao

Package Used:

Astar Pathfinding Project by Aron Granberg
